content:
Torej v obdelavi imam eno nokio 6120c, sw zadnji 6.01, telefon dela na vse SIM kartice.

Težava št. 1: rad bi namestil sisx program (preko Nokia PC Suite) -> http://mobile-phones.com.pk/softwares/internet/email-for-nokia--10-accounts-q44018

, dobivam "Certificate Error. Contact the application supplier.""

tako kot tukaj:
http://mobileways.de/support/p...ation-supplier/

tole sem nastavil, ne pomaga
http://www.imserba.com/forum/solution-certificate-error-contact-application-supplier-problem-t95951/

Igral sem se tudi s prestavljanjem datumov nazaj (do 2006, korak po 1 leto), ni efekta..


Težava št. 2: telefon bi rad resetiral na tovarniške nastavitve, prejšnji lastnik prisega da lock code ni spreminjal, privzeta 12345 / 0000 ne dela, prav tako ne dela koda, ki so sproducija http://nfader.su/ (glede na imei telefona, večkrat sem tudi preveril če sem vpisal pravilen imei dobljen z metodo *#06#).
author: Ytbnd

content:
Končno uspeh !

Koda je bila 1 in štiri 2

http://www.mobilephonetalk.com...sb-cable&s=

[ANT] Simple is a tiny program that reads the security code of any Nokia phone that supports USB connection mode.

1. Downoad [ANT] Simple

2. If you have Nokia PC Suite running, be sure to close it by exiting from the taskbar icon.

2. Extract [ANT] Simple ] and run Simple.exe located in the folder

4. Connect the phone vis USB to the computer

4. On the MAIN tab, click on GET. Your phone IMEI number and model should be displayed on the bottom panel
author: Ytbnd
